mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.MCH_CODE, A.MAINTENANCE_DATE, A.MAINTENANCE_PERIOD, A.PERIOD_UNIT, A.DUTY_PERSON_ID, A.STATUS, A.CREATED_TIME, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_TIME, A.UPDATED_BY, B.MCH_NAME, B.SPEC, B.TYPE_VERSION, B.FACTORY_NO FROM EM_MAINTENANCE_ORDER A LEFT JOIN EM_EQUIPMENT B ON A.MCH_CODE = B.MCH_CODE
